name: Domi's Dice Dozer
description:
"Dice Dozer" - by   DMDSkunkworks

For best experience, go full-screen with sound, and use gamepad.  If Elementary School is a distant memory, "Survival mode" is for you!

I was sitting around Saturday morning, working through some pre-K math workbooks with my little guy while watching some GMTK 2022 devlogs on Youtube, and realized how long its been since we've done a game jam.  Decided to combine all of those thoughts and make a math game, with rolling dice, under the constraints of the Weekly Game Jam we usually do here on Itch.

Thanks for Playing!

-D
